snippet: The U.S. men's national futsal team must defeat Canada Tuesday night in Guatemala City to retain any hope of qualifying for the FIFA Futsal World Cup, later this year in Thailand.
abstract: The U.S. men's national futsal team must defeat Canada Tuesday night in Guatemala City to retain any hope of qualifying for the FIFA Futsal World Cup, later this year in Thailand.

headline.main: Futsal: U.S. Desperate for a Win
